data.title: Great pizza
data.text: Ordered garlic and tomatoe pizza. Excellent service and very nice atmosphere. Food is excellent,  well know for pizza. Located in town. Highly recommended.

data.title: Get out of the office
data.text: It's been a long week so I took out my staff to lunch for a well deserved break and lunch.  Pizza was on the menu and sangria for me.  I had a cauliflower pizza which was cooked well and very tasty. We also had the white pizza and prosciutto and peppers pizza.  All the pizza was very good and the sangria was excellent.  Excellent service as always. Glad we went.

data.title: Tasty pizza!
data.text: Good service, the pizzas came in very timely, good choices of beer and the pizza where delicious for a reasonable price. I will visit this restaurant again!

data.title: Anthony's
data.text: I've loved Anthony's Pizza since the moment it opened in White Plains. We order their pizza, wings, and salad for family parties and eat it the restaurant a good amount. Their pizza is still good, but it used to be a lot better when it first opened. Even the wings were slightly disappointing last time I visited. I recommend giving it a try because if you get lucky, the food can be amazing! The cauliflower pizza is my favorite.

data.title: Wow
data.text: We had heard good things about Anthony's so decided to try it last night.  Wow was it really good.  The wings are done in the pizza oven and covered with sauteed onions and served with foccacia bread.  So different from the buffalo chicken wings we have come to expect from restaurants.  Truly delicious!  Then we split a broccoli rabe and sausage pizza.  Again really, really good.  Try it, you won't be disappointed.

data.title: Lunch at Anthonys
data.text: Instead of the personal pan pizza I went for their delicious grilled chicken lunch salad,with olives, eggs, tomatoes, gorgonzola cheese. Absolutely great and 5 star.

data.title: Great pizza coal fired!
data.text: Been there many times w my husband we love the traditional pizza and the fab salad! Totally love it gloified sports bar can be noisy but fun!

data.title: Good wood oven pizza
data.text: if you like thin, wood fired pizza you will like this place.  Typical charred crust pizza.  Cauliflower pizza is DELISH!! Be careful though, it's loaded with big chunks of garlic which makes it good but if that bothers you watch out for it.  Meatball and ricotta pizza is also very good.  They don't have a lot of choices other than pizza though.  They do have full bar and in the summer if it's not too hot out the front windows open up completely so it's like patio at those front tables.

data.title: Great pizza and very friendly staff!
data.text: We stopped in for pizza and beer after a long day in the city.  Needless to say the pizza was fantastic as was the young lady who took care of us.  It was a very relaxed atmosphere with great pizza!  Give it a try.

data.title: Great pizza 🍕
data.text:
Visited at lunchtime with two adults & two kids.  
Staff were very friendly and helpful - advising us on drinks, food etc.
Huge pizza reasonably priced.
Lovely surroundings.

Good offers on drinks 🍸🍷🍺

data.title: Fantastic Pizza
data.text: So I was really surprised to find such great pizza in the Heart of White Plains.  Really good.  The service was really good too.  I went for lunch with a friend a our two kids which of course made a mess and they were very accommodating.

data.title: Anthracite cooking at its finest
data.text: This is a great spot for those around main street in White Plains.  The atmosphere is great and the bartenders are the best.  We had the roasted cauliflower pizza...I know, it sounds like it sounds, but it was great!

data.title: My neighborhood bar
data.text: I visit Anthony's often! The staff is super friendly, and I love sitting at the bar chatting with the other locals. Their pizza is fantastic. It's thin crust and "well done". Definitely a must try!

data.title: This Pizza was Amazing!!!!
data.text: We have never visited White Plains and we stayed at the Cambria Suites . Upon getting settled we were hungry and didn't want to go too far. We looked online & asked the front desk about our choice to give you a try and they love you. This was an outstanding Pizza!!! We are not from here so we didn't know what to expect. Whether you live here or visit THIS is the place to eat. Reasonable prices,Great atmosphere, Great salad but the Pizza is the real deal !!!! Took what little leftovers we had cause its that good. We plan on eating here every time we cone to White Plains. Thanks for such an outstanding Pizza Pie!

data.title: Sports bar!
data.text: Didn't meet my expectations. I was expecting more of an Italian restaurant but the menu is mostly burgers, wings, and pizza. I had a pizza that was pretty good. It was also a lot louder than I expected, it is a sports bar and was packed when we were there. Staff were responsive and friendly. It is a BIG place although from the outside it looks small.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Great Food, Everything on the menu is good. A little too much salt but otherwise a great placee.  The atmosphere is friendly the service great and everything is clean! Whethe its a group, just the two of you or a family. There is something for everyone.

data.title: Decent Pizza
data.text: Reasonably good pizza and very good salads. Nice surroundings, nice bar, good service. High calories are the one drawback.

data.title: Good Pizza- no pasta. Fuggedaboudit!
data.text: Hard to believe it, but they seem busy even though they don't offer pasta AT ALL. The salad is good-nothing spectacular. And the white pizza is very good. I hear the meatballs are really great, but without spaghetti...who cares? I am not sure if they are trying to be different, or if the chef does not know how to properly cook pasta, but whatever the reason, I say, fuggedaboudit!

data.title: friday night piza
data.text: Best Pizza we've had in a long time.  The salad is family style and delish, can't get enough.  A bit noisy but worth going.  Meatballs also good.

data.title: Wings and Pizza
data.text: I have carried out from here many times. The pizza is definitely the best I've had in WP. Even though its a chain, the pizza is definitely top quality that you'd find in any local pizzeria in NY. The wings are also awesome, the original wings are really meaty and more like a rotisserie chicken than wings, but they are so good I'll definitely order them again. Will return, want to try and dine-in next time.
